job.title: Data Scientist Jr
job.description: YOUR NEXT STEP IS AT RAPPI!<br><br>Rappi is one of the first Latin American unicorns and a start-up that continues to focus on growing and making life easier for our users. As a company, we seek to continue improving the services we already offer, add more to our offer and continue expanding throughout the Latin American continent.<br><br>Rappi is the fastest growing Latin American startup, backed by the world's top investors, including Sequoia, Andreesen Horowitz, Y Combinator and Softbank. We reached unicorn status last year and haven't slowed down. We operate in 100+ cities across 9 countries in Latin America, with large hubs in Mexico City, Bogotá, São Paulo, and Buenos Aires.<br><br>At Rappi, no two days are the same. We love to hustle, work hard for a greater good and strive to be the leading tech company in Latin America. Rappi is growing at a tremendous rate and this position is crucial in our pursuit of a game-changing experience for our users and partners.<br><br>Main Responsibilities<br><ul><li>Assists with deep data sets analysis for operations and management decisions</li><li>Create, maintain, and optimize reports including SQL statements, views, functions, and stored procedures</li><li>Synthesize large, complex data sets into impactful insights and build analytical stories that shape the operations roadmap and culminate in strategic business decisions</li><li>Work with product management teams to process client’s requests and help translate this feedback into product requirements<br></li></ul>Key Requirements<br><ul><li>Bachelor's degree in Mathematics, Data Management, Marketing, Statistics, Physics, Computer Science, a related field, minimum 3+ years’ experience working on business analytics projects (preferred)</li><li>Experience working with large data sets and strong practical knowledge of analytical techniques</li><li>Strong knowledge building dashboards on Data studio o Power BI</li><li>Experience in data analysis, reporting, market research, segmentation and data modeling</li><li>Demonstrated analytical and problem-solving skills, with a bias for action, integrity, and accountability</li><li>Strong teamwork and client service orientation </li><li>Strong SQL skills </li><li>Fluent in English (written &amp; spoken) </li></ul>He leído y acepto la Autorización de Datos Personales de Rappi S.A.S<br><br>https://docs.google.com/document/d/e/2PACX-1vRFEkFojVd3AfFsARRsdZpiSjA_xQGK5Y7ZCBT3gw19MOdQVqH5nRAuSqyu3yZq2A/pub<br><br>Conforme a la Política de Tratamiento de Datos Personales<br><br>https://legal.rappi.com/colombia/politica-de-proteccion-y-tratamiento-de-datos-personales-rappi-s-a-s/<br><br>I have read and accept the Authorization of Personal Data from Rappi S.A.S<br><br>https://docs.google.com/document/d/e/2PACX-1vRFEkFojVd3AfFsARRsdZpiSjA_xQGK5Y7ZCBT3gw19MOdQVqH5nRAuSqyu3yZq2A/pub<br><br>In accordance with the Personal Data Treatment Policy<br><br>https://legal.rappi.com/colombia/autorizacion-de-tratamiento-de-datos-personales-rappitenderos-rappi-s-a-s/
